label: SanitaryMeasure
comment: Sanitary measures as reported for a WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health).

datatypeProperties.comment: An application date, time, date time or other date time value for this MDH sanitary measure.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A location, expressed as text, for this MDH sanitary measure.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

referencedBy.comment: A sanitary measure applied for this MDH health indication.
